languages.text: {n}Маражай стискивает оружие, оглядывая чудовищную тварь перед собой. В его взгляде — подавленный страх и мрачный восторг.{/n} "Ну же... почему мы медлим, {name}?"
{n}Marazhai grips his weapon tighter as he looks over the monstrosity facing him. Suppressed fear blends with dark admiration in his eyes.{/n} "Come on, {name}... what are we waiting for?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай стискивает оружие, оглядывая чудовищную тварь перед собой. В его взгляде — подавленный страх и мрачный восторг.{/n} "Ну же... почему мы медлим, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon tighter as he looks over the monstrosity in front of him. Suppressed fear blends with dark admiration in his eyes.{/n} "Come on, {name}... what are we waiting for?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋把武器握得更紧了。他打量着眼前的怪物，眼神中既有压抑的恐惧，又有充满邪恶的钦佩之意。{/n}“动手吧，{name}……我们还在等什么呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon tighter as he looks over the monstrosity facing him. Suppressed fear blends with dark admiration in his eyes.{/n} "Come on, {name}... what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋把武器握得更紧了。他打量着眼前的怪物，眼神中既有压抑的恐惧，又有充满邪恶的钦佩之意。{/n}“动手吧，{name}……我们还在等什么呢？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai umklammert seine Waffe fester, als er auf das Monstrum blickt, das ihm gegenübersteht. Unterdrückte Furcht mischt sich in seinen Augen mit dunkler Bewunderung.{/n} "Kommt, {name} ... worauf warten wir denn?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon tighter as he looks over the monstrosity facing him. Suppressed fear blends with dark admiration in his eyes.{/n} "Come on, {name}... what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai umklammert seine Waffe fester, als er auf das Monstrum blickt, das ihm gegenübersteht. Unterdrückte Furcht mischt sich in seinen Augen mit dunkler Bewunderung.{/n} "Kommt, {name} ... worauf warten wir denn?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai aprieta su arma con más fuerza al contemplar la monstruosidad que tiene delante. En su mirada hay una mezcla de miedo reprimido y una siniestra admiración.{/n} «Vamos, {name}... ¿a qué estamos esperando?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon tighter as he looks over the monstrosity facing him. Suppressed fear blends with dark admiration in his eyes.{/n} "Come on, {name}... what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai aprieta su arma con más fuerza al contemplar la monstruosidad que tiene delante. En su mirada hay una mezcla de miedo reprimido y una siniestra admiración.{/n} «Vamos, {name}... ¿a qué estamos esperando?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai serre son arme un peu plus fermement en observant la monstruosité qui lui fait face. Son regard brille d'une lueur mêlant peur refoulée et sombre admiration.{/n} « Alors, {name}... Qu'attendons-nous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon tighter as he looks over the monstrosity facing him. Suppressed fear blends with dark admiration in his eyes.{/n} "Come on, {name}... what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai serre son arme un peu plus fermement en observant la monstruosité qui lui fait face. Son regard brille d'une lueur mêlant peur refoulée et sombre admiration.{/n} « Alors, {name}... Qu'attendons-nous ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは武器を強く握りしめ、目の前の怪物を見渡した。彼の目には、抑圧された恐怖と暗い賞賛が混ざり合っている。{/n} 「さあ行くぞ、{name}…ぐずぐずしてる暇はねえ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon tighter as he looks over the monstrosity facing him. Suppressed fear blends with dark admiration in his eyes.{/n} "Come on, {name}... what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは武器を強く握りしめ、目の前の怪物を見渡した。彼の目には、抑圧された恐怖と暗い賞賛が混ざり合っている。{/n} 「さあ行くぞ、{name}…ぐずぐずしてる暇はねえ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, silahını sıkıca kavrayıp karşısındaki garabete bakıyor. Bastırmaya çalıştığı korku, gözlerine yerleşen kara hayranlığa karışıyor.{/n} "Hadi ama {name}... Ne duruyoruz?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon tighter as he looks over the monstrosity facing him. Suppressed fear blends with dark admiration in his eyes.{/n} "Come on, {name}... what are we waiting for?"
